entity.name: Items
entity.query: SELECT i.ItemId AS ItemId, DATE_FORMAT(i.DateStart, '%Y-%m-%dT00:00:00Z') AS StartDate, DATE_FORMAT(i.DateEnd, '%Y-%m-%dT23:59:99Z') AS EndDate, s.StoryId AS StoryId, s.ProjectId AS ProjectId, DATE_FORMAT(i.Timestamp, '%Y-%m-%dT%TZ') AS Timestamp, i.Title AS Title, i.Description AS Description, i.ImageLink AS PreviewImageLink, transcriptionView.TextNoTags AS TranscriptionText, transcriptionView.Languages AS Languages, categoriesView.Categories AS Categories, keywordsView.Keywords AS Keywords, placesView.PlaceNames AS PlaceNames, placesView.WikidataPlaceNames AS WikidataPlaceNames, placesView.WikidataIds AS PlaceWikidataIds, placesView.Coordinates AS PlaceCoordinates, personsView.Person AS Persons, coStatus.Name AS CompletionStatusName, coStatus.ColorCode AS CompletionStatusColorCode, coStatus.ColorCodeGradient AS CompletionColorCodeGradient, trStatus.Name AS TranscriptionStatusName, trStatus.ColorCode AS TranscriptionColorCode, trStatus.ColorCodeGradient AS TranscriptionColorCodeGradient, deStatus.Name AS DescriptionStatusName, deStatus.ColorCode AS DescriptionColorCode, deStatus.ColorCodeGradient AS DescriptionColorCodeGradient, loStatus.Name AS LocationStatusName, loStatus.ColorCode AS LocationColorCode, loStatus.ColorCodeGradient AS LocationColorCodeGradient, taStatus.Name AS TaggingStatusName, taStatus.ColorCode AS TaggingColorCode, taStatus.ColorCodeGradient AS TaggingColorCodeGradient FROM Item i JOIN Story s ON s.StoryId = i.StoryId LEFT JOIN (SELECT ItemId, GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT (Category) SEPARATOR '#~#') AS Categories FROM item_category_view WHERE ItemId = '426491' GROUP BY ItemId ) categoriesView ON categoriesView.itemId = i.ItemId LEFT JOIN (SELECT ItemId, GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT (Keyword) SEPARATOR '#~#') AS Keywords FROM item_keyword_view WHERE ItemId = '426491' GROUP BY ItemId ) keywordsView ON keywordsView.ItemId = i.ItemId LEFT JOIN (SELECT ItemId, GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT (PlaceName) SEPARATOR '#~#') AS PlaceNames, GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT (WikidataPlaceName) SEPARATOR '#~#') AS WikidataPlaceNames, GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT (TRIM(WikidataId)) SEPARATOR '#~#') AS WikidataIds, GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT (CONCAT(Latitude, ',', Longitude)) SEPARATOR '#~#') AS Coordinates FROM item_place_view WHERE ItemId = '426491' GROUP BY ItemId ) placesView ON placesView.ItemId = i.ItemId LEFT JOIN (SELECT ItemId, GROUP_CONCAT( CONCAT(IFNULL(FirstName, ''), ' ', IFNULL(LastName, '')) SEPARATOR '#~#') AS Person FROM item_person_view WHERE ItemId = '426491' GROUP BY ItemId ) personsView ON personsView.ItemId = i.ItemId LEFT JOIN (SELECT ItemId, ANY_VALUE(TextNoTags) as TextNoTags, GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT (Language) SEPARATOR '#~#') AS Languages FROM item_transcription_view WHERE ItemId = '426491' AND CurrentVersion = 1 GROUP BY ItemId ) transcriptionView ON transcriptionView.ItemId = i.ItemId LEFT JOIN CompletionStatus coStatus ON i.CompletionStatusId = coStatus.CompletionStatusId LEFT JOIN CompletionStatus trStatus ON i.TranscriptionStatusId = trStatus.CompletionStatusId LEFT JOIN CompletionStatus deStatus ON i.DescriptionStatusId = deStatus.CompletionStatusId LEFT JOIN CompletionStatus loStatus ON i.LocationStatusId = loStatus.CompletionStatusId LEFT JOIN CompletionStatus taStatus ON i.TaggingStatusId = taStatus.CompletionStatusId WHERE i.ItemId = '426491';
